H0.text: It decreases soil erosion, helping the environment through no-till farming.

H1.text: It increases soil removal in no-till farming, which helps the environment.

H2.text: It increases fertilizer use, helping the environment by improving soil fertility and reducing nutrient runoff in noâ€‘till farming.

H3.text: It decreases crop yield, which is how no-till farming helps the environment.

A4.text: No-till farming decreases the amount of soil erosion tillage causes in certain soils, especially in sandy and dry soils on sloping terrain.

A5.text: No-till can increase yield because of higher water infiltration and storage capacity, and less erosion.
